mapper.select: SELECT id FROM matching_request_info WHERE process_yn = 'N' AND team_id = #{teamId}
SELECT id FROM matching_info WHERE status != 'E' AND (team_a_id = #{teamId} OR team_b_id = #{teamId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matching_request_info(team_id, process_yn, request_timestamp) VALUES(#{teamId}, 'N', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.team_id, b.id, c.name, c.rank_score, c.kind, c.description, CASE WHEN d.id IS NULL THEN 'W' -- 대기 ELSE d.status END AS status, CASE WHEN d.id IS NULL THEN (SELECT code_name FROM common_code WHERE use_yn='Y' AND group_id='0011' AND code='W') ELSE (SELECT code_name FROM common_code WHERE use_yn='Y' AND group_id='0011' AND code=d.status) END AS status_name FROM team_user_mapping a INNER JOIN matching_request_info b ON a.team_id = b.team_id AND b.process_yn='N' INNER JOIN team_info c ON a.team_id = c.id AND c.use_yn = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN matching_request_mapping d ON (b.id = d.b_team_matching_request_id OR b.id = d.a_team_matching_request_id) WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT b.id , a.team_id , CASE WHEN a.id = b.a_team_matching_request_id THEN b.b_team_matching_request_id ELSE b.a_team_matching_request_id END , DATE_FORMAT(a.request_timestamp, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS requestTime , DATE_FORMAT(b.create_timestamp, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS makeTime , DATE_FORMAT(b.match_timestamp, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS matchTime , IFNULL(b.status, 'W') , (SELECT code_name FROM common_code WHERE group_id = '0011' AND code = IFNULL(b.status, 'W') AND use_yn = 'Y') , b.latitude , b.longitude , b.road_address , b.jibun_address FROM matching_request_info a LEFT OUTER JOIN matching_request_mapping b ON (a.id = b.a_team_matching_request_id OR a.id = b.b_team_matching_request_id) WHERE a.id = #{matchingRequestId}

SELECT a.team_id , b.status , (SELECT code_name FROM common_code WHERE group_id = '0011' AND code = b.status) , DATE_FORMAT(b.accept_timestamp, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS accept_time FROM matching_request_info a LEFT OUTER JOIN matching_info b ON a.id = b.matching_request_id WHERe a.id = #{matchingRequestId}
